name: com.fuzzphyte.ray
description: FP Raycaster is a set of scriptable objects that help define and give the user a lot of control over building different Unity Raycasts. Think of this as a Unity Engine wrapper for raycasting. Currently supports 2D and 3D raycasts, Boxcasts, cubecasts, circlecasting, and sphere casting.

samples.description: Includes some examples of the different scriptable object based raycasts
